overview.title: Where Every Heartbeat Matters
home_desc: Patel Hospital offers expert consultation, diagnosis, treatment and surgical options for heart care. The spacious and well-maintained premises of Patel Hospital in Jalandhar are well-equipped to provide all kinds of clinical diagnosis of heart conditions, starting from prevention of cardiac diseases to treatment of heart attack, bypass surgery, open-heart surgery, valvular interventions, angioplasty, congenital ailments, and cardiac rehabilitation.
The hospital also provides non-invasive echocardiography, TMT, angiographies, angioplasties, treatment of coronary artery and peripheral vascular diseases, valvular interventions and more.
The advanced CCU is also an excellent centre of care for heart patients.
Highly operational and reliable in case of all cardiac emergencies, the entire team and infrastructure at Patel Hospital is designed to make it the best heart treatment hospital in Jalandhar.

specialities.title: Interventional Cardiology
description: Patel Hospital introduced interventional cardiology to their roster of medical services in 2013. Since then, the hospital has been a leading provider of 24x7 emergency care for cardiac patients in Jalandhar.

The expert and experienced cardiologists at Patel Hospital treat a number of cardiac diseases and emergencies, including myocardial infarction, acute pulmonary thromboembolism, and cardiac arrhythmias, such as heart failure, cardiac tamponade, and various heart blocks.

specialities.title: Cardio-Thoracic & Vascular Surgery
description: Patel Hospital has world-class cardiovascular and thoracic surgery infrastructure with a team of experienced and dedicated cardiac surgeons. This expert team has performed several surgeries and procedures, including major cardiac and thoracic operations, with results comparable to the best in the world.
